name: deploynotebooks2024
description: Recursively deploys Notebooks from given folder to a Databricks Workspace
author: Microsoft DevLabs

inputs.name: notebooksFolderPath
inputs.label: Notebooks folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the path to the folder that contains the Notebooks to be published to the workspace.

inputs.name: workspaceFolder
inputs.label: Workspace folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specify the target path to publish the Notebooks on the Workspace. Defaults to `/Shared`.
